entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 40%
